componentType.description: Writes single Lines into a file

property.name: fileName
property.description: the name and path of the output file (.txt will be added automatically)

property.name: lineEndMark
property.description: the character(s) which mark a line end

property.name: append
property.description: if true, the file will be appended (not deleted)

property.name: addTimeToFileName
property.description: if true, the filename will be unique by adding the current time
